title: `tests/ui/issue-13560.rs` fails for wasm32-unknown

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I tried this code on 8637f65d61984bafbecdd33df834f4b4a3ab7e1d:

```rust
x test tests/ui/issue-13560.rs  --target wasm32-unknown-unknown
```

I expected to see this happen: The test passes successfully, just like it does for any other target.

Instead, this happened:
```
Check compiletest suite=ui mode=ui (x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -> wasm32-unknown-unknown)

running 1 tests
F

failures:

---- [ui] tests/ui/issue-13560.rs stdout ----

error: auxiliary build of "/home/jyn/src/rust3/tests/ui/auxiliary/issue-13560-3.rs" failed to compile: 
status: exit status: 1
command: "/home/jyn/src/rust3/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/bin/rustc" "/home/jyn/src/rust3/tests/ui/auxiliary/issue-13560-3.rs" "-Zthreads=1" "--target=wasm32-unknown-unknown" "--error-format" "json" "--json" "future-incompat" "-Ccodegen-units=1" "-Zui-testing" "-Zsimulate-remapped-rust-src-base=/rustc/FAKE_PREFIX" "-Ztranslate-remapped-path-to-local-path=no" "-Zdeduplicate-diagnostics=no" "-Cstrip=debuginfo" "--remap-path-prefix=/home/jyn/src/rust3/tests/ui=fake-test-src-base" "--out-dir" "/home/jyn/src/rust3/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/ui/issue-13560/auxiliary" "-Crpath" "-Cdebuginfo=0" "-Lnative=/home/jyn/src/rust3/build/wasm32-unknown-unknown/native/rust-test-helpers" "-L" "/home/jyn/src/rust3/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/ui/issue-13560/auxiliary"
stdout: none
--- stderr -------------------------------
error[E0463]: can't find crate for `issue_13560_1`
  --> fake-test-src-base/auxiliary/issue-13560-3.rs:5:25
   |
LL | #[macro_use] #[no_link] extern crate issue_13560_1 as t1;
   |                         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ can't find crate

warning: unused `#[macro_use]` import
  --> fake-test-src-base/auxiliary/issue-13560-3.rs:6:1
   |
LL | #[macro_use] extern crate issue_13560_2 as t2;
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^
   |
   = note: `#[warn(unused_imports)]` on by default

error: aborting due to previous error; 1 warning emitted
```

This looks like a real bug; this test has a comment that says this error is what it's intended to test: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/40bfeb7bebb6f4cfea9e07aadf381b3d3afc700d/tests/ui/issue-13560.rs#L7-L8

### Meta

HEAD is branched from dd2b19539ea4d62a150cf13d45942e58b6b44e54.
_Originally posted by @compiler-errors in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/109875#discussion_r1161355962_
